enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must have taken and passed RTVF 260-0.
title: SoC RTVF 360-0-23 Topics in Media Writing

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: The course will explore: What are some of the current issues facing the LGBTQIA community that are seen on social media? Which of the groups within this community are the most underrepresented? Where is LGBTQIA headed in terms of television/theater/web series, and what could the future hold? How do I tell a story that centers around LGBTQIA characters using the context of theatre, TV or web?

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Besides writing a pilot, play, or web content, students will also: prepare pitches and short critical papers around the material covered.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Articles, Skype talks, Media clips, and scripts which will be provided

Class notes: Access to a laptop and script writing software is important in this course and will not be provided.
